name: Notion Ultimate Personal Development System (Basic)
description: This is a free version of Notion Ultimate Personal Development System which only includes challenges and logs.Click here for the full version containing all displayed features.Be your best self.The Ultimate Personal Development System helps you achieve your long term goals by setting yourself short-term challenges. Keeping you motivated and focussed as you develop yourself physically and mentally.FeaturesSet challenges like "Read at least 5 pages of non-fiction per day" or "Go to the gym at leas
features: Set challenges like "Read at least 5 pages of non-fiction per day" or "Go to the gym at least once per week"; Add logs to track your progress against each of your goals; Automatically calculate your targets per day, week or month; Set your long terms goals and milestones; Align challenges to your goal to actively progress towards reaching them; Organise your challenges and goals bydomains- such as "Health" or "Family"; Set target amounts of energy you want to spend on each domain; Automatically measure the amount of time and energy you are spending per domain vs your targets
